branchCategory.name: Pressure Gauges
branchCategory.description: <p>SMC offers a variety of pressure gauges including general purpose, oil-free/external parts copper-free with limit indicator, clean series and a pressure gauge with a pressure switch.  Pressure ranges vary  from 0 to 1.5MPa, depending on the selected gauge.  Panel mounting is possible.</p>

branchItem.name: G
branchItem.description: <P>SMC offers a variety of pressure gauges including general purpose, oil-free/external parts copper-free with limit indicator, clean series and a pressure gauge with a pressure switch.  Pressure ranges vary from 0 to 1.5MPa, depending on the selected gauge.  Panel mounting is possible.</P>

branchItem.name: GD
GP46
branchItem.description: GP46 pressure gauge has been combined with a built in pressure switch.  It is available with or without an indicator light to confirm switch operation.  Options include a clear cover ring assembly and 3m lead wire length.

branchItem.name: GS
